title: Goldman Sachs vs JP Morgan Offer evaluation - need suggestion
content:
Help me to decide which one I should go for -

Education: Tier-3 college
Years of Experience: 11 plus
Prior Experience: yes
For fresh grad, any related Internship/coop experience?
For experienced engineer, what's your current and past experience? Staff Software Enginner at fintech
Date of the Offer: Augest 2024
Company: Goldman Sachs
Title/Level: VP
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 63l as fixed
Relocation/Signing Bonus: No
Stock bonus: No
Bonus: 23l 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 86l 
Benefits: Standard Compny benefits
Other details:

Similar offer from JPMC but they are also giving Joining Bonus although the yearly bonus promised by them is lesser than GS. Considering the brand value I am inclined towards GS but open for sugegstions.

title: Databricks | SSE | Bangalore
content:
Education: Tier 2
Years of Experience: 9 years
Prior Experience: Series C startup
Last Drawn TC: 62L + ESOPs (~7LPA as per cur valuation) 
Date of the Offer: Sept 2024
Company: Databricks
Title/Level: L5
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 70L
Signing Bonus: 2L
Perf Bonus: 15% of base = ~10.5L
RSUs (private): 5500 over 4 years = (~84LPA as per curr valuation)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 80.5L + 84L (paper money)

Is there any scope for negotiations? I don't have a competing offer at present.

title: Splunk (Cisco) | Nium | SDE2 | Offer Evaluation
content:
Hello Folks,
Wanted to understand which would be better to join Splunk(Acquired by Cisco) or Nium (Fintech company, not yet listed. Chances of listing in late 2025. Current valuation $1.4B). Both roles are good in terms of WLB, learning and suitable for my profile.

Current -
Company: Product based startup 
Title/Level: SDE 2
Exp: 3 years 2 months
Base Salary: INR 22.5L
Variable: 2.5 Lpa
Yearly: INR ~25.5 LPA

Offer In Hand -

Company: Splunk
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: INR 30L
Variable: INR 3L
Stocks : 85000 USD(Vested over 3 years)
CTC: INR 56.5 Lpa(1st year)

Company: Nium
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: INR 37L
Variable: 5L
Esops: 45000 USD(Vested over 4 years)
CTC : INR ~51 Lpa(1st year)

Splunk has better CTC, and as it acquired by Cisco, stocks can be easily converted to cash. Nium has better base, but need to wait for the listing to convert esop to cash. Would like to know your thoughts. Thank you.

title: Microsoft | L63 | Hyderabad
content:
Education: Tier 3
Years of Experience: 9 years
Prior Experience: Healthcare 
Last Drawn CTC: 29 L
Date of the Offer: Sept 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L63
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: 43L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3 + 2 L
Stock bonus: $100K for 4 years
Perf Bonus: Upto 30% of base,
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 78L for 1st year

Had a competing offer from Google( L4) : [Google](https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5663696/google-l4-bangalore/2607358)

Not sure about the scope of negotiations here. Any ideas on what to do ?
I am currently in Bangalore and so is the offer from Google, which is convinient. MS requires me to shift to Hyderabad.
